account_created.title: Account Validation
account_created.subject: Account Validation
account_created.email_message_intro: Congratulations, you have just created an account on {{origin}}! Your email address is linked to your account and identifies it. To finalize the creation of your account, please click the verification link below. This will help us ensure that you are the rightful owner of this email address.

reset_password.subject: One-Time Login Link
reset_password.email_intro: A password reset request was made for your account associated with the email address {{email}}. To log in immediately, use the unique link below, valid for 30 minutes. Click this link to continue:
reset_password.email_tip: If you no longer have access to your password, remember to update it in “My Account” > “Change Password.”
reset_password.email_ignore: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
